summary: The object of this mod is to make the Nightingale and Dark Brotherhood helmets act like the Gray Cowl of Nocturnal.
descriptionHtml:
The object of this mod is to make the Nightingale and Dark Brotherhood helmets act like the Gray Cowl of Nocturnal. Equip them and commit unlawful acts while being noticed and your bounty will rise. However, remove the helmet while not being seen by anyone and your bounty will go back to the amount it was before you equipped the helmet.

I tested the Nightingale helmet and the DB helmet and they work however if you are still being chased and you remove that helmet the guards will continue to attack until you kill them or reload your savegame.

Installation: If you are having trouble with NMM then place the .esp file into your Skyrim Data folder and place the two .pex files in Skyrim/Data/Scripts

For those looking for a fix on the Dark Brotherhood masks for males Sundracon made Brotherhood Mask for Man and Mer - male:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2445/?

Currently only works for:
All playable Nightingale helmets
All playable Dark Brotherhood helmets

Additions to come:
All other masks that obscure your face (possibly as a separate mod)
Armor recognition - where you will need to change your armor on top of your helmet as the guards will recognize both. This may be instant recognition if you wear armor and helmet, remove helmet and not armor and the guards will be increasingly suspicious.
author: Valdaer
